name: Dancy Bones
description:
"Dancy Bones" for #indiesvsgamers jam

You are on an undercover mission to prove that not only the dead can dance!

Watch the skeletons and fit in as good as possible before your disguise fails you.

Note: Highscores only work while playing on gamejolt.

Controls:

- WASD or arrow keys

Made with phaser in 72h for IndiesVsGamers game jam

by @farwyler @shakemeluzifer
